thread.title: Convenient location & free breakfast & Wi-Fi!
thread.title_full: Convenient location & free breakfast & Wi-Fi! - Review of Broadway at Times Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Tiffany R
title: Convenient location & free breakfast & Wi-Fi!
text: My son & I enjoyed our stay at the Broadway at Times Square Hotel! The free breakfast & free wi-fi were a plus! And we were able to walk to all of our destinations (mainly Broadway theaters..) because the location was near everything! Clean rooms, comfortable bed & pillows and the water would get hot fast! Would definitely stay here again!
